response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premier product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. Given its unparalleled quality and functionality, it is worth $1,200,000 to us. However, I understand the importance of negotiation and am offering you the opportunity to acquire this masterpiece at an exclusive price of $1,100,000. This is a special offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for excellence. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1100000}
